item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Germany and Finland ‘deeply concerned’ about severed undersea cable
2. Lutnick and Bessent’s battle to be Trump’s Treasury secretary turns bitter
3. [Opinion] Trump’s attack on the enemy within will delight America’s real foes
4. Singapore oil trader sentenced to 17 years for ‘cheating’ HSBC over $112mn
5. Stealth sackings: why do employers fire staff for minor misdemeanours?
